Name: Candy Bar
About the game: You inherit a candy store in a provincial town, but there is one problem - there are no employees in the store. Explore the city to find new acquaintances and go through the history of each girl to invite them to work for you. By hiring new employees, you will be able to cook sweets with them, and then give them a taste of them. You will be able to give a new sweetness to a girl for trial whenever you want in free mode. Features Atmospheric music Meditative gameplay Mini-games Changing the time of day and days of the week Story companies Lots of sweets Izumi - IS ALREADY IN THE GAME! A modest girl who loves swimming. Izumi is closely watched by an old coach who does not allow her to do what she wants. Go to the pool and take the girl to your candy store. To do this, you will need the skills of a swimmer and a tempter. Shizuka - WORK IN PROGRESS! A quirky employee of the local library. Naomi - WORK IN PROGRESS! A young beauty who dreams of becoming a rock star. Akane - WORK IN PROGRESS! A beauty salon worker with a difficult character.
